description: Keep your little dancers on their toes for hours of sweet fun with this precious “Ballet Bakery” jigsaw puzzle! Your young dancer is sure to twirl with delight over these budding ballerinas! This adorable “Ballet Bakery” puzzle features a trio of dancers in their cute tutus as they gaze longingly at a window full of ballet-themed delectable treats. They’ve just finished their dance class and are deciding which they’d like best. Someone’s lost their toe shoes, but the friendly pooch retrieves one while the ballerina kitty cat dances with the other! An adorable puzzle for your budding prima ballerina! Puzzles develop hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills and problem-solving, and this 100-piece puzzle has extra-large, durable pieces little hands can easily hold on to for lots of repeat fun! Clean-cut pieces and Ravensburger’s tight interlocking fit provide a pleasurable puzzling experience for children and their adult helpers alike.
